attributes.additional_details: Why do the government call this a bonus, it is not a bonus more of an. Insult to disabled and elderly people. This needs to be changed, this is not fair.
attributes.background: The Christmas bonus amount has not changed since it's introduction in 1972. The introductory amount was £10 and it has not changed in 53 years. This has to change as a matter of urgency.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Adjust the £10 DWP Christmas Bonus introduced in 1972 to reflect inflation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/746900
